cards.title: Minto Pyramid
cards.desc: Make your communication more efficient and clear.

cards.title: Situation-Behavior-Impact
cards.desc: Give clearer feedback to others without judgement.

cards.title: Concept map
cards.desc: Understand relationships between entities in a concept or system.

cards.title: Ishikawa Diagram
cards.desc: Identify root causes of problems.

cards.title: Cynefin framework
cards.desc: Make sense of different situations to choose an appropriate response.

cards.title: Conflict Resolution Diagram
cards.desc: Find win-win solutions to conflicts

cards.title: Six Thinking Hats
cards.desc: Look at a decision from different perspectives

cards.title: Productive Thinking Model
cards.desc: Solve problems creatively and efficiently.

cards.title: Connection circles
cards.desc: Understand relationships and identify feedback loops within systems.

cards.title: Second-order thinking
cards.desc: Consider the long-term consequences of your decisions.

cards.title: Iceberg Model
cards.desc: Uncover root causes of events by looking at hidden levels of abstractions.

cards.title: Eisenhower Matrix
cards.desc: Prioritize your actions and tasks by importance and urgency

cards.title: Ladder of inference
cards.desc: Avoid jumping to conclusions. Make decisions based on reality.

cards.title: Abstraction laddering
cards.desc: Frame your problem better with different levels of abstraction.

cards.title: Decision matrix
cards.desc: Choose the best option by considering multiple factors.

cards.title: Inversion
cards.desc: Approach a problem from a different point of view.

cards.title: Issue trees
cards.desc: Structure and solve problems in a systematic way.

cards.title: Confidence determines speed vs. quality
cards.desc: Determine a trade-off between speed and quality when building products.

cards.title: First principles
cards.desc: Break down complex problems into basic elements and create innovative solutions from there.

cards.title: Balancing feedback loop
cards.desc: Mechanism that pushes back against a change to create stability.

cards.title: Reinforcing feedback loop
cards.desc: Make your communication more efficient and clear.

cards.title: Hard choice model
cards.desc: Figure out what kind of a decision you're making.
